protocol.text: Plants were grown for 4 days in long day (16hr light/8hr dark) 22 degreeC conditions in a Percival (Percival Scientific).  Plants were grown on agar in 1x MS  All plant lines are in the Col-0 background.

Seedlings at 4 dpg were transferred to a plate of 5% agar solid medium (1X MS salts, 0.5% sucrose) to ensure a hard support and the root tip was surgically excised under a dissecting microscope using a 30G sterile dental needle (ExelInt), with a cutting error of about 5 um. The plant was immediately returned to a standard 0.8% agar solid medium (1X MS salts, 0.5% sucrose) for recovery. For microarray analysis, 130 um of uncut tip or 70 um of regenerating stumps were manually excised with the 30G needle
Biotinylated cRNA from all isolated samples was prepared according to the standard two-cycle Affymetrix protocol from 50 ng total RNA

Sets of 5 tissue samples were collected each in 2.5 ul of extraction buffer (XB) of the Pico Pure RNA Isolation Kit (Araturus), flash-frozen in liquid nitrogen and ground. At least 25 samples were pooled for each experimental replicate (4 replicates)
